channel.title: New Graphics Card
channel.description:
Replacing my crossfire Sapphire Radeon 4850 cards with a XFX Geforce GTX 275 OC 896MB GDDR3, (640Mhz), 2xDVI, HDTV, SLIx3, 16X PCIe just to be able to play Wurm maxed out.
Good choice of nvidia card or no?

item.title: New Graphics Card
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Invoke:

I don’t need a Graphics Card upgrade, lucky me, because I got this laptop like a month or two ago.

Who the fuck are you and why are you acting all smart?

Read full topic

item.title: New Graphics Card
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:24, topic:286300”]I am so glad I read this thread, fucking hilarious.

Speljohan, you will have to try out Badaboom and see how fast you can transcode a movie.[/quote]

I tried using that software with my 8800, though I didn’t buy it if you know what I mean because I wanted to see if it was worth it first and it kept giving me the blue screen everytime I started transcoding. Was there anything certain you had to do?

Read full topic

I also have a 8800GTX (but from EVGA).[/quote]
Is sucking dicks your hobby or is it just a part time job? Because I really see you sucking up to staff if you’re telling people to get out, because it’s really none of your business.
[/quote]
How is saying I have the same hardware as a member (or in this case staff member) of the forum sucking dick? Perhaps you should go back to http://moparisthebest.com/smf where you belong.[/quote]
Orly? Because that should be where you belong piece of trash. I’m not a moparscaper, moparscapers flame everyone they see and they don’t have lives. I have a life. You don’t. Now go back to your pathetic job of dick sucking. Reported motherfucker.
